last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Eighteen: Final Exam
last_episode_to_air.overview: The PLLs take a final stab at their list of suspects, and through a harrowing night will discover the identity of Bloody Rose Waters once and for all.

name: Pretty Little Liars: Original Sin
overview: Twenty years ago, a series of tragic events almost ripped the blue-collar town of Millwood apart. Now, in the present day, a group of disparate teen girls finds themselves tormented by an unknown Assailant and made to pay for the secret sin their parents committed two decades ago, as well as their own.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In 1999, tragic events threatened to rip apart a close-knit circle of friends and the small town of Millwood. Twenty years later, a new group of Millwood High students is hunted by an assailant known as "A," who threatens to make them pay for their parents' past transgressions and sins of their own.

seasons.name: Summer School
seasons.overview: In Season 2, our PLLs face down summer school and a new villain — who may or may not have a connection to "A" — ready to put them all to the test.

tagline: It's gonna be a killer summer.

episodes.name: Chapter One: Spirit Week
episodes.overview: In 1999, a group of friends is rocked by the sudden death of one of their own. Twenty-two years later, their daughters are pushed together by a mysterious foe.

episodes.name: Chapter Two: The Spirit Queen
episodes.overview: As Imogen and her newfound friends plot revenge against a mutual nemesis, Karen and her twin sister Kelly hatch an insidious plan of their own.

episodes.name: Chapter Three: Aftermath
episodes.overview: In the wake of Spirit Week, Imogen unearths long-buried truths on her path to unmask the mysterious “A.” After Sheriff Beasley closes in, Noa, Faran, and Mouse weigh their options, while Tabby works to recover vital evidence.

episodes.name: Chapter Four: The (Fe)male Gaze
episodes.overview: After their punishment comes to an end, the girls cement their friendship when Imogen needs them most.

episodes.name: Chapter Five: The Night He Came Home
episodes.overview: Desperate to keep her mother’s house, Imogen throws a Halloween party to raise cash.

episodes.name: Chapter Six: Scars
episodes.overview: As Imogen and Tabby dig into the mystery surrounding Angela Waters, Faran deals with the scars of her past. After Shawn confronts Marjorie, Noa questions her relationship with her mother, while Mouse spots a familiar face on her first date.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven: Carnival of Souls
episodes.overview: As the Millwood carnival approaches, Mouse and Tabby each struggle with secrets, and Noa notices Shawn isn’t himself. Meanwhile, Imogen considers her baby’s future, and Faran confronts everything that’s been plaguing her.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: The friends work together to uncover Imogen and Tabby’s assailant during the Annual Thanksgiving Millwood High Blood Drive. Later, Sidney confronts Tabby about her secrets.

episodes.name: Chapter Nine: Dead and Buried
episodes.overview: Despite coming clean about “A,” the friends find their troubles are far from over – especially as the results of the group’s clandestine blood drive push Tabby towards a new suspect.

episodes.name: Chapter Ten: Final Girls
episodes.overview: As “A” doubles down, the friends must work quickly to uncover the link between Angela Waters’ death, their mothers, and their mysterious foe… before it’s too late.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In 1999, tragic events threatened to rip apart a close-knit circle of friends and the small town of Millwood. Twenty years later, a new group of Millwood High students is hunted by an assailant known as "A," who threatens to make them pay for their parents' past transgressions and sins of their own.

episodes.name: Chapter Eleven: Spookyspaghetti.com
episodes.overview: The PLLs await the results of A's trial and a much-needed break – only to be cursed with a fate worse than death ... summer school.

episodes.name: Chapter Twelve: Summer Lovin
episodes.overview: Heeding Dr. Sullivan's advice, the PLLs make the most of their summers. Meanwhile, Imogen forges a new identity away from her closest friends.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirteen: Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: As the PLLs plan Mouse's surprise sixteenth birthday party, Tabby and Imogen face boy problems, Noa clashes with Jen and Faran spills her secret.

episodes.name: Chapter Fourteen: When a Stranger Calls Back
episodes.overview: Still shaken from her encounter with Bloody Rose, Mouse searches for the real Rose Waters. Meanwhile, Imogen keeps tabs on Dr. Sullivan, Tabby works on a new short, Noa takes a much-needed day off, and Faran’s strength is put to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: Chapter Fifteen: Friday the 13th
episodes.overview: A disturbing discovery causes the PLLs to doubt Dr. Sullivan. Meanwhile, during Tabby's movie marathon, Noa is forced to make a brutal decision.

episodes.name: Chapter Sixteen: Hell House
episodes.overview: After discovering that Kelly's church is using her former home for their disturbing "Hell House", Imogen springs into action, while Mouse and Ash plan a Pride pool party in protest. Later, the PLLs' plan to freak out the faithful takes a frightening turn.

episodes.name: Chapter Seventeen: The Bogeyman
episodes.overview: Still shaken from Hell House, Imogen learns about Dr. Sullivan's secret ties to A, while the PLLs set out to uncover Bloody Rose's identity.

episodes.name: Chapter Eighteen: Final Exam
episodes.overview: The PLLs take a final stab at their list of suspects, and through a harrowing night will discover the identity of Bloody Rose Waters once and for all.

2.name: Summer School
2.overview: In Season 2, our PLLs face down summer school and a new villain — who may or may not have a connection to "A" — ready to put them all to the test.
